title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 149-1.7 - Expenditure check

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 149-1.7 - Expenditure check

State Regulations
A school district which is required to submit a district
plan in accordance with section
149-1.3
(a) or (b)
of this Part which spends less in local funds during the current year than in
the base year for the purposes of conducting programs for students with
compensatory educational needs shall have its apportionment of comprehensive
operating aid under subdivision 12 of section
3602
of the

Education Law reduced in an amount equal to such deficiency in the current year
or the succeeding school year. In addition, a district which spends any part of
its total annual setaside attributable to students with compensatory
educational needs in an unauthorized manner in the base year shall have its
current year apportionment of comprehensive operating aid reduced in an amount
equal to the amount of such unauthorized expenditures. In no event shall the
reductions assessed pursuant to this section on the current year apportionment
of comprehensive operating aid be deducted from the setasides required pursuant
to this Part and paragraphs f, g and h of subdivision 12 of section
3602
of the

Education Law. Notes
